snippet: PRICE--Robert. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Robert Price, who perpetuated a family tradition of selfless philanthropy, which has had a profound impact on the Jewish community in New York, in Israel, and beyond. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Robert's children, Steven (Tina) and Eileen Farbman (Steven); his grandchildren, Alexandra (Ben), Leo, Lucy, and Kyle; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: PRICE--Robert. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Robert Price, who perpetuated a family tradition of selfless philanthropy, which has had a profound impact on the Jewish community in New York, in Israel, and beyond. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Robert's children, Steven (Tina) and Eileen Farbman (Steven); his grandchildren, Alexandra (Ben), Leo, Lucy, and Kyle; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
